meanings.definition: Made by joining two or more things together.
meanings.sent1: The combined efforts of the team led to success.
meanings.sent2: The combined weight of the books was too heavy to carry.
meanings.sent3: The combined flavors of chocolate and vanilla created a delicious ice cream.
meanings.sent4: The combined forces of nature could not stop the determined hiker.
meanings.sent5: The combined colors of red and blue made a beautiful purple.

meanings.sent1: The combined puzzle pieces formed a complete picture.
meanings.sent2: The combined voices of the choir filled the concert hall.
meanings.sent3: The combined efforts of the students made the teacher proud.
meanings.sent4: The combined strength of the team overcame all obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The combined flavors of sweet and salty delighted the taste buds.
